sense.name: provide with fertilizer or add nutrients to
sense.examples: We should fertilize the soil if we want to grow healthy plants. The farmer used a mechanical spreader to fertilize the field. The best time to fertilize is in the spring or fall.

sense.name: make fertile or productive
sense.examples: The course fertilized her imagination. Compost fertilizes the soil. I hoped some of the love would fertilize the work.

sense.name: introduce semen into (a female)
sense.examples: Do you fertilize stem cells with them? The male fertilizes the egg during mating. Scientists fertilize eggs in pitre dishes for experiments.
